academia.title: Secundary School
academia.subtitle: J. M. Barandiaran (behekoa)
academia.description: 4 years during which I had every detail about my life's path perfectly defined and I was absolutelly sure about my future... (naive)

experience.title: Bartender

experience.title: Bachelor's degree Final Project

experience.title: Master's Final Project
